main.name: Philip Roush
main.description: Available to start work immediately. Willing and able to relocate!
main.bio: My name is Philip, I'm a Full Stack Developer. Experienced in Ruby on Rails and React/JavaScript based programming with a background in Oil and Gas and Hospitality/Customer Service. Ability to create a full stack web application from scratch using cross-platform coding languages-- individually and/or as member of a team. With a background in the Hospitality and Customer Service, it has provided diverse and strong interpersonal skills that will positively impact a teams cohesiveness and productivity. Excels in giving input when appropriate, but recognizes the importance of effective listening and how crucial it also is to efficacious workplace communication.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree, Geography: Resource and Environmental Studies
education.description: BS, with a minor in Business
15-week program developing skills in Ruby on Rails, Javascript, & React through completion of multiple projects and pair programming
Intro to HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

work.title: Valet Manager/Golf Services/Member Services
work.description: Worked for 3 different Discovery Land Company properties. Part of two property opening teams. Manager/supervisor of a valet staff of 12-15 employees. Took care of members needs and wants.

work.title: GIS Supervisor & Account Payables Attendant
work.description: Developed and managed the GIS department. Created maps of current and potential oil wells to meet clients specifications. Processed an average of 100 invoices per week. Obtained and entered vendor w-9 and set up of new vendors. Responsible for the process of annual filings of 1099s.

projects.title: Iskwobel Golf
projects.category: Full Stack Ruby on Rails Backend and ReactJS Front End!

testimonials.text: Philip is an ambitious and charismatic teammate who would be a unique asset to any organization. His ability to think outside the box and use new technologies to streamline processes ensures the job gets done as efficiently as possible while creating a fun and exciting work environment.
testimonials.user: Brennan Medford-- Director of Sales at ProNovos Construction Analytics
